title: Arkansas Firm Recalls Ground Turkey Products Due to Possible Salmonella Contamination
summary: Editor's Note: Recall Release 071-2011 is updated on Sept. 27, 2011 to reflect that the Aug. 24, 2011 sample of ground turkey referenced in the Sept. 11, 2011 Recall Release has now been confirmed as the Salmonella Heidelberg outbreak strain (XbaI PFGE pattern 58/BlnI pattern...
